Description: Limestone stela; modified ankh beneath a pediment; two lines of Greek text.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.11, Pl.10)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Gr. I 10:3 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
